dcterms:creator: Siva Reddy
Diana McCarthy
Suresh Manandhar
dcterms:description: Compositionality judgments for 90 compounds and their individual word components, collected with Mechanical Turk, with a scale of literality from 0 (idiomatic) to 5 (literal).
dcterms:title: Reddy

dcterms:creator: Carlos Ramisch
Silvio Cordeiro
Leonardo Zilio
Marco Idiart
Aline Villavicencio
Rodrigo Wilkens
dcterms:description: An extension of the Reddy dataset with an additional 90 English nominal compounds, collected through Mechanical Turk, totaling 180 entries.
dcterms:title: Reddy++

dcterms:creator: Meghdad Farahmand
Aaron Smith
Joakim Nivre
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 1042 English compounds extracted from Wikipedia with binary non-compositional judgments by four experts.
dcterms:title: Farahmand

dcterms:creator: Carlos Ramisch
Silvio Cordeiro
Leonardo Zilio
Marco Idiart
Aline Villavicencio
Rodrigo Wilkens
dcterms:description: A new resource created for this evaluation, containing 180 adjective-noun and noun-adjective compounds in French, collected through crowdsourcing.
dcterms:title: FR-comp
